description.fr: {CharacterName:654} a perfectionné son appeau afin de protéger les oreilles de {CharacterName:596} tout en attirant les Shushus, pour le plus grand plaisir de {CharacterName:708}.
description.en: {CharacterName:654} has perfected his bird whistle so that it doesn't hurt {CharacterName:596}'s ears when attracting Shushus, to the great delight of {CharacterName:708}.
description.es: {CharacterName:654} ha perfeccionado su reclamo para protegerle las orejas a {CharacterName:596} y seguir atrayendo a los fab'huritus, para el disfrute total de {CharacterName:708}.
description.de: {CharacterName:654} hat seinen Lockvogel weiterentwickelt, um beim Anlocken von Shushus {CharacterName:596}s Ohren zu schützen. Das freut {CharacterName:708} ganz besonders.
description.pt: {CharacterName:654} aperfeiçoou seu apito para proteger os ouvidos de {CharacterName:596}, mas sem deixar de atrair os Shushus, para a alegria de {CharacterName:708}.

descriptionFinished.fr: Les appeaux inventés par {CharacterName:654} ont tous leur utilité face aux Shushus. {CharacterName:708} s'en réjouit\_: désormais, grâce à son fils, les bastons ont toutes une saveur différente.
descriptionFinished.en: All of the bird whistles invented by {CharacterName:654} can be useful when dealing with Shushus. {CharacterName:708} is delighted. Now, thanks to his son, the fights all have a different mood.
descriptionFinished.es: Los reclamos que ha inventado {CharacterName:654} tienen todos su utilidad contra los fab'huritus. {CharacterName:708} está encantado: gracias a su hijo, a partir de ahora cada pelea tiene un sabor diferente.
descriptionFinished.de: Die von {CharacterName:654} entwickelten Lockvögel leisten alle beim Anlocken von Shushus gute Dienste. {CharacterName:708} freut sich ganz besonders darüber: Dank seinem Sohn hat jetzt jede Keilerei ihren ganz eigenen Reiz.
descriptionFinished.pt: Os apitos inventados por {CharacterName:654} são muito úteis contra os Shushus. {CharacterName:708} está radiante: agora, graças ao seu filho, as pancadarias têm um sabor ainda mais especial.
